trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> class modifies the attributes of an existing directory entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> 클래스는 기존 디렉터리 항목의 특성을 수정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> class.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> class.
This constructor creates an empty request.
The distinguished name of the object to modify.
An array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects that specify the modifications.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> class using the specified distinguished name and modifications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" /> 생성자는 지정된 고유 이름과 수정 사항을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the object to be modified.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeOperation" /> object that specifies the modification to perform.
The name of the attribute to modify.
This parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 <see langword="null" />일 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The new values for the attribute.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeOperation,System.String,System.Object[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> class using the specified distinguished name, modification, attribute name, and values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeOperation,System.String,System.Object[])" /> 생성자는 지정된 고유 이름, 수정 사항, 특성 이름 및 값을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.DistinguishedName" /> property contains the distinguished name of the object to modify.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.DistinguishedName" /> 속성에는 수정할 개체의 고유 이름이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the object to modify.

The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.Modifications" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object that specifies a list of attribute modifications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.Modifications" /> 속성에는 특성 수정 사항의 목록을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> 개체가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object that specifies a list of attribute modifications.
trans-unit.target: 특성 수정 사항의 목록을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method creates an XML node from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> 메서드는 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 개체에서 XML 노드를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object.
